favicon.label: Favicon PNG
favicon.description: Select your favicon.png. It appears in the browser's address bar, tab and bookmarks. The recommended size is 96x96 pixels.

favicon_svg.label: Favicon SVG
favicon_svg.description: Select an optional favicon.svg. Modern browsers will use it instead of the PNG image. Use CSS to toggle the SVG color scheme for light/dark mode.

touchicon.label: Touch Icon
touchicon.description: Select your apple-touch-icon.png. It appears when the website is added to the home screen on iOS devices. The recommended size is 180x180 pixels.

custom_js.label: Script
custom_js.description: Add custom JavaScript to your site. The <script> tag is not needed.

custom_less.label: CSS/Less
custom_less.description: Add custom CSS or Less to your site. All Less theme variables and mixins are available. The <style> tag is not needed.

yootheme_apikey.label: YOOtheme API Key
yootheme_apikey.description: Enter the API key to enable 1-click updates for YOOtheme Pro and to access the layout library as well as the Unsplash image library. You can create an API Key for this website in your Account settings.

yootheme_apikey_warning.label: YOOtheme API Key
yootheme_apikey_warning.description: Please install/enable the installer plugin to enable this feature.

avif.description: Serve optimized image formats with better compression and quality than JPEG and PNG.

highlight.label: Syntax Highlighting
highlight.description: Select the style for the code syntax highlighting. Use GitHub for light and Monokai for dark backgrounds.

clear_cache.label: Cache
clear_cache.description: Clear cached images and assets. Images that need to be resized are stored in the theme's cache folder. After reuploading an image with the same name, you'll have to clear the cache.

_config.label: Theme Settings
_config.description: Export all theme settings and import them into another installation. This doesn't include content from the layout, style and element libraries or the template builder.

google_maps.label: Google Maps
google_maps.description: Enter your Google Maps API key to use Google Maps instead of OpenStreetMap. It also enables additional options to style the colors of your maps.

google_analytics_anonymize.description: Enter your Google Analytics ID to enable tracking. IP anonymization may reduce tracking accuracy.

mailchimp_api.label: Mailchimp API Token
mailchimp_api.description: Enter your Mailchimp API key for using it with the Newsletter element.

cmonitor_api.label: Campaign Monitor API Token
cmonitor_api.description: Enter your Campaign Monitor API key for using it with the Newsletter element.

_image_quality_description.description:
Define the image quality in percent for generated JPG images and when converting JPEG and PNG to next-gen image formats.

Mind that setting the image quality too high will have a negative impact on page loading times.

Press the Clear Cache button in the advanced settings after changing the image quality.
